# flitz

![](docs/icon.png)

A file explorer / finder with a tkinter GUI. Fast Location / Indexing / Traversal Zone.

![](docs/_static/flitz.png)

## Installation

```
pip install flitz
```

## Usage

Start it by executing `flitz` or `python -m flitz`.
It might also be `python3 -m flitz` on your machine.
